context_of_use: This use case allows a power user to update and maintain their personal profile information within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: wants to keep account details accurate
description: Allows users to update and maintain their personal profile information.
triggering_event: Power user initiates a request to update profile information.
preconditions: Power user is logged into the system.
postconditions: User profile information is updated successfully.
assumptions: The power user has valid login credentials.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to update their profile information.
main_flow: 1. Power user requests to update profile information → System prompts for authentication.
2. Power user provides authentication credentials → System verifies credentials.
3. System confirms authentication → System displays profile update form.
4. Power user updates profile information → System saves updated information.
5. System confirms successful update → Power user receives confirmation message.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If authentication fails, System displays an error message and prompts for re-entry of credentials.
